columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: A fully qualified resource ID for the resource.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource.

columns.name: version
columns.description: Specifies the server version.

columns.name: geo_redundant_backup_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether geo-redundant backup is enabled for server backup, or not.

columns.name: user_visible_state
columns.description: A state of a server that is visible to user. Valid values are: 'Ready', 'Dropping', 'Disabled'.

columns.name: administrator_login
columns.description: The administrator's login name of a server.

columns.name: auto_grow_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether storage auto grow is enabled for server, or not.

columns.name: backup_retention_days
columns.description: Specifies the backup retention days for the server.

columns.name: earliest_restore_date
columns.description: Specifies the earliest restore point creation time.

columns.name: fully_qualified_domain_name
columns.description: The fully qualified domain name of a server.

columns.name: master_service_id
columns.description: The master server id of a replica server.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: Indicates whether or not public network access is allowed for this server. Valid values are: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'.

columns.name: replication_role
columns.description: The replication role of the server.

columns.name: replica_capacity
columns.description: The maximum number of replicas that a master server can have.

columns.name: sku_capacity
columns.description: The scale up/out capacity, representing server's compute units.

columns.name: sku_family
columns.description: The family of hardware.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: The name of the sku.

columns.name: sku_size
columns.description: The size code, to be interpreted by resource as appropriate.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: The tier of the particular SKU. Valid values are: 'Basic', 'GeneralPurpose', 'MemoryOptimized'.

columns.name: ssl_enforcement
columns.description: Indicates whether SSL enforcement is enabled, or not. Valid values are: 'Enabled', and 'Disabled'.

columns.name: storage_mb
columns.description: Specifies the max storage allowed for a server.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: A list of private endpoint connections on a server.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
